recommendations.title: Migrate to AWS Reserved Instances
recommendations.description: Migrate Compute instances to AWS Reserved Instances to reduce costs by up to 20%.
steps: Identify eligible instances for Reserved Instances
Purchase Reserved Instances for 1-3 years
Monitor and adjust Reserved Instances as needed

recommendations.title: Implement Auto-scaling for Compute
recommendations.description: Implement Auto-scaling for Compute instances to reduce costs by up to 6% by scaling down during off-peak hours.
steps: Configure Auto-scaling for Compute instances
Set up scaling policies for off-peak hours
Monitor and adjust Auto-scaling as needed

recommendations.title: Right-size Database Instances
recommendations.description: Right-size Database instances to reduce costs by up to 23% by downgrading instance types.
steps: Identify eligible instances for right-sizing
Downgrade instance types for Database instances
Monitor and adjust instance types as needed

recommendations.title: Implement Caching for Database
recommendations.description: Implement caching for Database to reduce costs by up to 10% by reducing the load on Database instances.
steps: Configure caching for Database instances
Set up caching policies for frequently accessed data
Monitor and adjust caching as needed

recommendations.title: Migrate to Open-source Database

steps: Identify eligible Database instances for migration

Monitor and adjust migration as needed
